This course is divided into 2 main sections:

1. Tools for survival analysis
2. Causal inference

with time at the beginning and end of the course to put these tools into the context of asking and answering important public health questions.

This page provides quick links to the [readings](/readings/) <i class="fas fa-book-reader"></i>, [lecture materials](/content/) <i class="fas fa-laptop-code"></i>, and [exercises](https://www.sakai.unc.edu) <i class="fas fa-pencil-ruler"></i>.
